title: F minor figured bass - cadential six-four

content.question:
Realize the figured bass below in four voices, following traditional eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. In the space below each chord, supply the Roman numeral that appropriately indicates harmonic function.

Enter any notes as you prepare your response.

frqParts.text:
Realize the figured bass below in four voices, following traditional eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. In the space below each chord, supply the Roman numeral that appropriately indicates harmonic function.

Enter any notes as you prepare your response.

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Apply knowledge of common-practice tonality to spell chords and to follow procedures of 18th-century voice leading to connect chords in harmonic progressions.
